title: Every game destroyed by Master YI
body: Same story every game. The Yi presses R and prenta kills your team. Nothing you can do about it. Try to CC him he just presses Q to avoid it. Try fight him under tower he just meditates to absorb the damage. No way to kite him with his about Q range and move speed. No way to itemize against him with his free true damage. Every game there is a Yi ends the same way and I'm tired of it.

replies.body:
_"Ok yi can dodge my cc with his Q"_
**Throws cc while he has Q up**
**cc gets dodged by Q**
_0MG YI BR0KEN_

Yeah instead of complaining about a champ being broken, learn to play against it.

> [{quoted}](name=solopolo3,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:21:48.168+0000)
>
> _"Ok yi can dodge my cc with his Q"_
> **Throws cc while he has Q up**
> **cc gets dodged by Q**
> _0MG YI BR0KEN_
> 
> Yeah instead of complaining about a champ being broken, learn to play against it.

You know. I’d consider this a valid argument. If his q wasn’t always up. And if he didn’t have a 9000% ms boost on his ult so he did need it to engage.

> [{quoted}](name=The thigh guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:28:44.421+0000)
>
> You know. I’d consider this a valid argument. If his q wasn’t always up. And if he didn’t have a 9000% ms boost on his ult so he did need it to engage.

You know, I'd consider this a valid argument if you were using actually valid numbers instead of hyperbole.

> [{quoted}](name=solopolo3,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:33:14.675+0000)
>
> You know, I'd consider this a valid argument if you were using actually valid numbers instead of hyperbole.

*sigh* the value isn’t important. And fine if you must have values 25/35/45 with immunity to slows (including as slows)

At rank 1 with 380 ms. Boots 1. That’s 475 ms. Which is not kiteable. It’s also not escapeable.  It also lasts 7 seconds. Which is ages. 

Point being HE DOESNT NEED HIS Q TO GET IN YOUR ASS. Meaning a yi with half a brain only uses it to dodge cc and finish targets.

> [{quoted}](name=The thigh guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:42:42.848+0000)
>
> *sigh* the value isn’t important. And fine if you must have values 25/35/45 with immunity to slows (including as slows)
> 
> At rank 1 with 380 ms. Boots 1. That’s 475 ms. Which is not kiteable. It’s also not escapeable.  It also lasts 7 seconds. Which is ages. 
> 
> Point being HE DOESNT NEED HIS Q TO GET IN YOUR ASS. Meaning a yi with half a brain only uses it to dodge cc and finish targets.

475 is not escapable? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

who do you play, kog?

also, his Q is _intended_ to dodge cc. It also has a cooldown. If he doesn't auto, he doesn't get his Q back.

> [{quoted}](name=solopolo3,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:21:48.168+0000)
>
> _"Ok yi can dodge my cc with his Q"_
> **Throws cc while he has Q up**
> **cc gets dodged by Q**
> _0MG YI BR0KEN_
> 
> Yeah instead of complaining about a champ being broken, learn to play against it.

What an ignorant thing to say. I'll just save my CC for when his Q is on cooldown, meanwhile, he is saving his Q for my CC and auto-attacking me to death. How about I just bait his Q with my first CC, then I use my second CC to kill him because I have seven abilities that are hard CC all on short cooldowns. 

How about you stop playing bots before you give advice.

> [{quoted}](name=TrollsShouldDie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2018-12-08T06:47:24.819+0000)
>
> What an ignorant thing to say. I'll just save my CC for when his Q is on cooldown, meanwhile, he is saving his Q for my CC and auto-attacking me to death. How about I just bait his Q with my first CC, then I use my second CC to kill him because I have seven abilities that are hard CC all on short cooldowns. 
> 
> How about you stop playing bots before you give advice.

Wait, you need 7 cc abilities to bait his Q and then land your cc? Nice math.

All you need to do to kill a yi is land a single cc. You can't tell me a proper team comp won't have more than 2 forms of hard cc.
Not every yi is unstoppable. Your best bet would be a counter pick.

> [{quoted}](name=Ferrinova,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-07T20:04:47.718+0000)
>
> Not every yi is unstoppable. Your best bet would be a counter pick.

Problem is. He only has 1 real counterpick. Being Jax. But if they are picking yi they are banning Jax. 

I guess malzahar and lissandra could be counters. Except qss makes them worthless.

And Udyr.

and Cho'Gath

and Rammus

and a competent Lee Sin

and Kayle

and sometimes Illaoi

and Kindred

and Nocturne

and Rengar

and oh god Shaco

and sometimes Shyvana

and sometimes Trundle

and Skarner

and Taric

and Tryndamere

and Zilean

Just looked at lolalytics and I can't believe I forgot Kha'Zix and Elise

> [{quoted}](name=TehNACHO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:17:26.389+0000)
>
> And Udyr.
> 
> and Cho'Gath
> 
> and Rammus
> 
> and a competent Lee Sin
> 
> and Kayle
> 
> and sometimes Illaoi
> 
> and Kindred
> 
> and Nocturne
> 
> and Rengar
> 
> and oh god Shaco
> 
> and sometimes Shyvana
> 
> and sometimes Trundle
> 
> and Skarner
> 
> and Taric
> 
> and Tryndamere
> 
> and Zilean
> 
> Just looked at lolalytics and I can't believe I forgot Kha'Zix and Elise

Udyr cannot burst a yi faster than he heals with Bork 

Cho gets melted with true damage as fast as everyone else

Rammus. Same deal. True damage is too much. Taunt means nothing to yi. 

Competent lee sins don’t exist on ally teams only enemies. (Shaco syndrome)

Kayle, this one I’ll give to you. But only if it’s 1v3

Illaoi. No. Just no. Maybe in a teamfight where she hit 5 with her ult. 

Kindred. Maybe? I guess? He is just gonna q on hit her at the end of the ult so not really. 

Nocturn. Qss and done. 

Rengar. Feast or famine. It’s get fed an one hit him or lose. Every time. Hardly a counter if you need to be fed prior. 

Shaco. I guess. But again. Shaco syndrome. 

Shyvana. No. True damage shreds her just as fast as everyone else. 

Trundle. Again. True damage too much. 

Skarner. If you are 1v3. Sure. 

Taric. Sure. Until the yi has Bork and merurial. (Because he still heals off of hitting you)

Tryndamere. Nope. Yi uses meditate during your ult then finishes you off with a q. 

Zilean slows down how fast you die. But it won’t matter because he won’t be able to stunna yi in alpha strike.

...Excuse me? Have you seen an Udyr with a Yi?

AP Bruiser Cho'Gath kills Yi faster than Yi kills Cho

Depends on who's more fed and if Yi specifically builds around Rammus or not. In an even matchup, without Wit's End and Guinsoo's, Rammus still wins

Heh

Mmhmm

Note the sometimes.

Ehh you have a point in a duel, but Kindred's most annoying in shutting down Yi's resets in a Teamfight, which in a team fight, means a dead Yi.

You haven't seen a Nocturne against a Yi. At least in the mid game. Late game favors Yi.

More of a Rengar problem than a matchup problem. If we view it as a matchup, the matchup still favors Rengar.

Heh.

Again you assume dueling. The whole point of Shyvana is unmatchable PBE, which as it turns out, playing the objective game against Yi is extremely effective

This I'm more willing to concede. It seems when I play Trundle against Yi, I win, but then I play Yi against Trundle, I still win. I assume it has to do with the fact I build damage Trundle and most Trundles build Bruiser/Tank, the former stat checks Yi while the latter is stat checked by Yi.

When is Skarner not using his Ultimate to set up teammates (past being bad/bronze)

When is Taric alone

I would've believed you know this matchup if you said "just run away from him during Ult", but since you said to use Yi's W, I don't believe you know the matchup.

And, same game as Kindred and Kayle, the point is getting in the way of Yi's resets

I'm just getting the odd impression you don't know these matchups.

People dont seem to get that YI is not OP on average, but he is extremely OP in some situations and extremely toxic.
So just because he is not op when you/your team manages to make him a non factor early on does not make him a balanced champ.

I play draft or ranked and perma ban him, why should I play a game I don't enjoy that would defeat the purpose of a game.

> [{quoted}](name=Bobloser3555,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:36:37.470+0000)
>
> People dont seem to get that YI is not OP on average, but he is extremely OP in some situations and extremely toxic.
> So just because he is not op when you/your team manages to make him a non factor early on does not make him a balanced champ.

just because you fed him 5 kills before 15 minutes and he snowballs and 1v5s doesn't mean he's a broken champ.
there is no other champ that can do that except the old Fiora or Graves but they have been adjusted.

> [{quoted}](name=Bobloser3555,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2018-12-07T22:41:24.034+0000)
>
> there is no other champ that can do that except the old Fiora or Graves but they have been adjusted.

I guess you haven't played against jax, garen, kai'sa, diana, ekko, veigar, vlad, yasuo, irelia, ryze, fizz, draven, trynd, vel.
So... Ban Yi?
Yi is kind of a one-button wondertrash, so most of what you say is true. He probably needs a rework. He can be dealt with, but getting one-button penta kills is kind of a shit mechanic.
I'm watching All Stars at the moment. Which one are you? You earning yourself a participation trophy this year?
In other words, your time isn't worth anymore than anyone else. Thank goodness I don't have as many accounts to track my time on.
Well, it wouldn't make any sense for me to go back for another degree.
This degree on my wall disagrees, and I'm barely over 100 games into ranked. Thanks for your concern though. I'm reporting this as harassment and good luck with your life.

> [{quoted}](name=TrollsShouldDie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c6uARpc8,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-07T19:58:07.502+0000)
>
> prenta kills

https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/3543879283/1509e34005183da5ea4eb29150f341e5_400x400.jpeg
Just keep playing and practicing , you'll get to the point where you realize Yi is actually comically underpowered
